SELECT M.nickname, F.feed_id as feedId, F.created_at as createdAt, F.balance, F.charge_amount as chargeAmount FROM member_wallet F JOIN member M ON F.member_id = M.member_id
M.nickname LIKE '%' || #{params.keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY F.created_at DESC OFFSET #{params.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{params.perPage} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member_wallet F JOIN member M ON F.member_id = M.member_id
M.nickname LIKE '%' || #{params.keyword} || '%'

SELECT M.MEMBER_ID as memberId, M.NICKNAME, M.EMAIL, NVL(C.CREW_NAME, '로그인 사용자') AS crewName, CASE WHEN M.ROLE = 'COMPANY' THEN '회사' WHEN CM.MEMBER_ID IS NULL THEN '로그인 사용자' WHEN CM.IS_LEADER = 'Y' THEN '크루장' ELSE '크루원' END AS crewRole FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN CREW_MEMBER CM ON M.MEMBER_ID = CM.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN CREW C ON CM.CREW_ID = C.CREW_ID WHERE M.ROLE != 'ADMIN'
AND ( M.nickname LIKE '%' || #{params.keyword} || '%' OR C.crew_name LIKE '%' || #{params.keyword} || '%' )
ORDER BY M.CREATED_AT DESC OFFSET #{params.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{params.perPage} ROWS ONLY
